title: Modern Family House
description: A spacious modern family home featuring an open floor plan, large backyard, and a newly renovated kitchen. Perfect for growing families.

title: Luxury Apartment
description: Located in the heart of Manhattan, this high-rise apartment offers stunning skyline views, concierge services, and access to premium amenities.

title: Cozy Cottage
description: Charming cottage with rustic interiors, a private garden, and a welcoming porch. Ideal for first-time buyers or a peaceful getaway.

title: Beachfront Villa
description: Luxury villa directly on the beach with a private pool, floor-to-ceiling windows, and breathtaking ocean views. Designed for relaxation and entertainment.
